attributes.action: Legalize the use of Hemp  AND  Cannabis use. The Majority of the country want to free the weed.
attributes.additional_details: Legalize the use of Hemp  AND  Cannabis use. The Majority of the country want to free the weed. It will save the country thousands. We can export paper made from hemp, clothes made from hemp, Cannabis to make the world happy and peaceful. And if push comes to shove, you could tax it and make even more money for your piggy bankers.
